author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Properly walk a directory hierarchy on a checkout.
We can now do a multi-directory checkout without props.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(find_attr): Add helper function to look up attributes.
(report_state_e): Add doc string.
(report_dir_t): Add new structure to represent directories
(report_info_t): Add docco; Add stringbuf; remove editor and dir batons;
(report_fetch_t): Add docco; remove txdelta handler, and root baton;
(report_state_list_t): Add docco
(report_context_t): Add list of pending directories to close and free-list
of report_info_t's.
(push_state): Support OPEN_DIR, ADD_DIR states; reuse file props; abort
on an unanticipated state.
(fetch_file): Update to use correct baton;
(start_report): Use new find_attr function; update to correct baton; use
namebufs as the editors require the *full relative* path (ouch!); note that
we can hit the ADD_FILE state from ADD_DIR; try to handle dir props (may
not work right now)
(end_report): Expand our tag name so we can do searches on it; support
exit state for ADD_DIR;
(finish_report): Deal with closing directories after we're done
processing the initial REPORT response.

author: julianfoad
msg: Clarify some API doc strings.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h
(svn_read_fn_t, svn_write_fn_t, svn_close_fn_t,
svn_stream_read, svn_stream_write, svn_stream_close, svn_stream_create):
Refer the reader to documentation of svn_stream_t for details.
(svn_stream_empty, svn_stream_from_aprfile, svn_stream_disown):
Tweak for consistency.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Close the dirs and editor batons; don't pass 0-length textdeltas.
(We can now do a single-directory checkout without problems.)
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/serf.c
(report_context_t): Add dir_baton field.
(handle_fetch): Call textdelta() only if we have data (otherwise, it'll SEGV)
(start_report): Update the directory baton pointer when we fetch it
(finish_report): Close the directory and editor when we're done.

author: dlr
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r18291.

author: julianfoad
msg: Clarify that the "ignored" status only applies to unversioned items.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_status_ignored): Expand the doc string.
